officer's training.name: Officer's Training
officer's training.desc: While using a sword or rapier, take 30% less posture damage from Critical Attacks.

target focus.name: Target Focus
target focus.desc: Enemies you charm take more damage from your squadmates in your party.

buster call.name: Buster Call
buster call.desc:
Radio in the Authority's navy for a buster call, sending out a barrage of bombardment wherever you see fit. 1d CD.
[*Note: Applies burn on hit, doesn't knock players.]
